Tests

Here are some more examples that didn't fit in the top nav. They demonstrate support for several features.

  • Border Collapse
  • Empty Table
  • Lazy Init
  • Caption Tag
  • Using with perfect-scrollbar plugin

These aren't examples, they are code that people submitted with their github issues (ripped out from jsfiddle). Leaving them here for regression testing, and as a reference for others.
Most of these were bugs that were fixed - and all of them should work properly unless they relate to a bug that hasn't been fixed yet.

  • Header Height
